source: College of Criminal and Justice Education (CCJE) Faculty List
topic: Complete Faculty and Administration of the College of Criminal and Justice Education (CCJE)
content:
The College of Criminal and Justice Education (CCJE) has established its official faculty and staff directory, which outlines the administrative leadership, professional course instructors, general education faculty, and student support personnel. 

The administration of the college is led by Dean Dr. Anabele Del Mundo-Riva. She is supported by Associate Dean Dr. May Liza Nera Ca√±as. Additionally, Dr. Juan Leonardo B. Britanico holds the position of Library and Extension Coordinator.

The faculty for Professional Courses is composed of both full-time and part-time instructors. Dr. Hassanour P. Cali serves as a Full-Time faculty member and holds the specific role of CSG Adviser. The department employs a significant number of Part-Time faculty members, including Dr. Dondon B. Maribbay, Prof. Braulio S. Basco, Prof. Edwin Brandon Gener, Prof. Daniel D. Garcia, Prof. Gonzalo Ricaplaza, and Prof. Marcelino Villanueva. Several attorneys also serve as Part-Time instructors, specifically Atty. Manolyn Collado, Atty. Georgian D. Pascua, and Atty. Jenalyn T. Baccay.

The General Education department within the CCJE includes a core team of Full-Time professors: Prof. Leonel S. Salvador, Prof. Esperanza M. Villena, Prof. Ma. Teresa Modesto, and Prof. Eugene Bayotas. Complementing the full-time staff are Part-Time instructors Prof. Godofredo Fajardo, Prof. Angelita S. Parlan, and Prof. Russie Perez. 

For Student Support services, Ms. Chescka Jane Vitto is designated as the Student Assistant.
keywords: College of Criminal and Justice Education
